column1: #Text=Katara says : " Can you believe she wo n't let me in ?
#Text=" Katara says : " I know , but still ... " Sokka says : " Well , we have other things to worry about .
#Text=Aunt Wu was wrong about the volcano .
#Text=" Katara says : " Sokka , you tried to convince me she was wrong before .
#Text=It 's going to take an awful lot to change my mind - " Katara says : " Oh no .
